summary: All 3 reported issues have been successfully fixed and verified. Comprehensive frontend testing completed for Droomvriendjes e-commerce website.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 reported issues verified as fixed: 1) Product reviews are now filtered per product using shortName, 2) Scroll to top works on product page navigation via useEffect with scrollTo(0,0), 3) Both 'In Winkelwagen' and 'Direct Bestellen' buttons work correctly. Cart sidebar also works on ProductPage with correct ShoppingCart icon in header.

issue_1_product_reviews.details: Reviews are correctly filtered per product. Tested on Leeuw (id=1), Eenhoorn (id=9), and Panda (id=11). Each product shows only its own reviews based on shortName matching.

issue_2_scroll_to_top.details: Page scrolls to top (scrollY=0) when navigating to product page. Tested via 'Bekijk Details' from HomePage and 'Bekijk Product' from related products section.

issue_3_in_winkelwagen_button.details: 'In Winkelwagen' button works on both HomePage and ProductPage. Adds product to cart and opens cart sidebar.

issue_3_direct_bestellen_button.details: 'Direct Bestellen' button adds product to cart and navigates to /checkout page.

cart_sidebar_on_product_page.details: Cart sidebar works correctly on ProductPage with ShoppingCart icon in header showing item count badge.

navigation_between_products.details: Navigation between products via 'Bekijk Product' button works correctly with scroll to top.

cart_icon_in_header.details: ShoppingCart icon present in ProductPage header with correct item count badge.

checkout_integration.details: Checkout page loads correctly with product in cart after 'Direct Bestellen' click.
